title: Dark Candy Fiddlestick Ult Bug
body: If you ult while using the Dark Candy Fiddlesticks skin, it shows the visual effects of Surprise Party Fiddlestick's ultimate.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look!
Hey, I'm not sure if the bug was fixed, or if it was just for the game I saw it in, but I tested it out a few more times and his ult looked like normal. Thanks for looking at it though. :)
